description:
Zamasu (Fused), the calm & collected Supreme Kai apprentice is bringing his brand of methodic deadliness to DRAGON BALL FighterZ!

This content includes:
• Zamasu (Fused) as a new playable character
• 5 alternative colors for his outfit
• Zamasu (Fused) Lobby Avatar
• Zamasu (Fused) Z Stamp
name: DRAGON BALL FIGHTERZ - Zamasu (Fused)
